entry.tran: （拥有某物或做某事的）权利，资格
entry.def: An entitlement to something is the right to have it or do it.

example.ex: They lose their entitlement to benefit when they start work.
example.tran: 他们一开始工作就失去了获得救济金的资格。

means.word_mean: 1. right granted by law or contract (especially a right to benefits);
